title: 1999/824/EC, Euratom: Council Decision of 6 December 1999 appointing a member of the Economic and Social Committee
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 6 December 1999
appointing a member of the Economic and Social Committee
(1999/824/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 258 thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Îtomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 166 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 15 September 1998 appointing the members of the Economic and Social Committee for the period from 21 September 1998 to 20 September 2002(1),
Whereas a member's seat on that Committee has fallen vacant following the resignation of Mr. A.A. Jaarsma, of which the Council was informed on 19 April 1999;
Having regard to the nominations submitted by the Netherlands Government,
Having obtained the opinion of the Commission of the European Communities,
main_body: Mr P.L.H. Geraads is hereby appointed a member of the Economic and Social Committee in place of Mr A.A. Jaarsma for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 20 September 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 December 1999.
For the Council
The President
T. HALONEN
(1) OJ L 257, 19.9.1998, p. 37.
